00039 #define _EGNSS_OPTIONFILE_H_

00043 #include "GNSS_Types.h"
00044 
00045 namespace GNSS
00046 {
00047   /// \brief   A derived option file class for the program.
00048   class GNSS_OptionFile : public OptionFile
00049   { 
00050   public: 
00051 
00052     /// \brief    The default constructor (no data allocated yet).
00053     GNSS_OptionFile();                                             
00054 
00055     /// \brief    The destructor.
00056     virtual ~GNSS_OptionFile();
00057 
00058   private:
00059 
00060     /// \brief   The copy constructor. Disabled!
00061     GNSS_OptionFile( const GNSS_OptionFile& rhs ) {};
00062 
00063     /// \brief   The assignment operator. Disabled!
00064     void operator=(const GNSS_OptionFile& rhs) {};
00065 
00066   public:
00067 
00068     /// \brief    Read and interpret the option file.
00069     /// \return   true if successful, false if error.
00070     bool ReadAndInterpretOptions( std::string OptionFilePath );
00071 
00072   public:
00073 
00074     struct stStationInformation
00075     {
00076       bool   isValid;          //!< Is this information valid.
00077       double latitudeRads;     //!< Station Latitude [rad].
00078       double latitudeDegrees;  //!< Station Latitude [deg].
00079       double longitudeRads;    //!< Station Longitude [rad].
00080       double longitudeDegrees; //!< Station Longitude [degrees].
00081       double height;           //!< Station Height [m]
00082 
00083       bool useTropo;           //!< A boolean to indicate if the tropospheric correction is enabled.
00084       bool useIono;            //!< A boolean to indicate if the broadcast ionospheric correction is enabled.
00085 
00086       double uncertaintyLatitudeOneSigma;  //!< Initial position uncertainty [m].
00087       double uncertaintyLongitudeOneSigma; //!< Initial position uncertainty [m].
00088       double uncertaintyHeightOneSigma;    //!< Initial position uncertainty [m].
00089 
00090       int satsToExclude[64];    //!< An array of satellite id (PRN for GPS) to exclude from processing.
00091       unsigned nrSatsToExclude; //!< The number of satellite id's specified in satsToExclude.
00092 
00093       std::string DataPath;     //!< The path to the datafile.
00094 
00095       // default constructor
00096       stStationInformation()
00097       : isValid(false),
00098         latitudeRads(0.0),
00099         latitudeDegrees(0.0),
00100         longitudeRads(0.0),
00101         longitudeDegrees(0.0),
00102         height(0.0),
00103         useTropo(true),
00104         useIono(true),
00105         uncertaintyLatitudeOneSigma(1.0),
00106         uncertaintyLongitudeOneSigma(1.0),
00107         uncertaintyHeightOneSigma(1.0),
00108         nrSatsToExclude(0)
00109       {
00110         unsigned i;
00111         for( i = 0; i < 64; i++ )
00112           satsToExclude[i] = 0;
00113       }
00114     };
00115 
00116     struct stGPSTime
00117     {
00118       int GPSWeek;
00119       double GPSTimeOfWeek;
00120 
00121       // default constructor
00122       stGPSTime() 
00123         : GPSWeek(-1), GPSTimeOfWeek(0.0)
00124       {}
00125     };
00126 
00127     /// The path to the option file.
00128     std::string m_OptionFilePath;
00129 
00130     /// The path to the output file.
00131     std::string m_OutputFilePath;
00132 
00133     /// A string is used to indicate the processing method.
00134     std::string m_ProcessingMethod;
00135 
00136     /// A boolean to indicate if only single difference measurements
00137     /// between the reference and rover station will be used.
00138     bool processDGPSOnly;
00139 
00140     /// The reference station information.
00141     stStationInformation m_Reference;
00142 
00143     /// The rover station information.
00144     stStationInformation m_Rover;
00145 
00146     /// The start time for processing.
00147     stGPSTime m_StartTime;
00148 
00149     /// The end time for processing.
00150     stGPSTime m_EndTime;
00151 
00152     /// The klobuchar ionospheric parameters.
00153     GNSS_structKlobuchar m_klobuchar;
00154 
00155     /// The elevation mask [degrees].
00156     double m_elevationMask;
00157 
00158     /// The C/N0 mask [dB-Hz].
00159     double m_cnoMask;
00160 
00161     /// The locktime mask [s].
00162     double m_locktimeMask;
00163 
00164   };
